DOC.detailed_description: Isolated GnRH Deficiency ( IGD ) rare disorder characterize decreased secretion GnRH , result impaired gonadotropin secretion subsequent impaired sex-steroid production . Patients rare clinical syndrome present absent , delay , stall pubertal development eighteen year age . In addition , non-reproductive phenotype spectrum identify individual , include anosmia , auditory ocular defect , skeletal , neurological , renal anomaly . Due complex heterogeneity among affected individual rarity disease , phenotypic spectrum fully investigate . The relationship psychological disorder IGD remain largely unexplored phenotypic association , despite evidence disorder puberty reproduction negative impact psychological profile . This study aim conduct preliminary investigation association psychological symptom IGD . We plan recruit adult patient diagnosis IGD complete online assessment measure psychological health outcome patient perspective order gauge prevalence negative emotional state among affected individual , compare healthy control . This determine whether study necessary investigate psychiatric disease part phenotypic spectrum disorder , improve understand complex disorder whole . Greater knowledge psychological impact IGD may impact current standard evaluation treatment patient delay pubertal maturation .
DOC.criteria: ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA FOR IGD PATIENTS : INCLUSION CRITERIA : Males females clinical finding consistent IGD great equal 18 year old treat hormone replacement therapy IGD full adult replacement dose least 3 month . Clinical finding IGD confirm nurse physician associate protocol , include : clinical presentation consistent diagnosis IGD , delay , incomplete , absent pubertal development , record serum hormone level demonstrate low total testosterone ( male ) estradiol ( female ) association low inappropriately normal gonadotropin level clinic note history physical , individual record demonstrate failure undergo normal puberty . Anosmia may may present . Since IGD present phenotypic spectrum , specific exclusion criterion study , except note . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients diagnosis IGD < 18 year old ; Patients diagnosis IGD full adult replacement dose sex hormone therapy least 3 month ; Patients diagnosis IGD indicate inclusion criterion ; Patients without access computer connect internet ; Patients read , write , understand English eighth grade level . ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA FOR HEALTHY CONTROLS : INCLUSION CRITERIA : Healthy male female great equal 18 year old . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Subjects chronic medical condition , seasonal/environmental allergy ; Subjects BMI < 18.5 > 29.9 ; Subjects prior history abnormal pubertal development , infertility , anosmia ; Subjects family history IGD ; Subjects without access computer connect internet ; Subjects read , write , understand English eighth grade level .
